Title: Relates to establishing the paint stewardship program
Summary: Relates to establishing the paint stewardship program, minimizing the public sector involvement in the management of post-consumer paint, and negotiating agreements to collect, transport, reuse, recycle, and/or burn for energy recovery at an appropriately licensed facility post-consumer paint using environmentally sound management practices.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to establishing the paint stewardship program
